ruleContent.replaceRegex:
<js>
(function(){
	var f1 = java.queryTTF("https://www.yodu.org/en/common/read.ttf");
	var f2 = java.queryTTF("https://files.catbox.moe/vihp58.ttf");
	return java.replaceFont(result, f1, f2);
})()
</js>

(function(){
	var f1 = java.queryTTF("https://files.catbox.moe/dcsyto.ttf");
	var f2 = java.queryTTF("https://files.catbox.moe/rvoqo6.ttf");
	return java.replaceFont(result, f1, f2);
})()
</js>

<js>
(function(){
	var font = src.match(/\.woff2\), url\((.*?.ttf)\);/)[1];
	url = "http://www.biquge.id/"+font;
	var f1 = java.queryTTF(url);
	var f2 = java.queryTTF("https://alanskycn.gitee.io/teachme/assets/font/Source Han Sans CN Regular.ttf");
	return java.replaceFont(result, f1, f2);
})()
</js>

<js>
(function(){
	var font = src.match(/\.woff2\), url\((.*?.ttf)\);/)[1];
	url = "https://www.xs84.me"+font;
	var f1 = java.queryTTF(url);
	var f2 = java.queryTTF("https://alanskycn.gitee.io/teachme/assets/font/Source Han Sans CN Regular.ttf");
	return java.replaceFont(result, f1, f2);
})()
</js>

header:
<js>
(()=>{
    var ua = "Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 7_1_2 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/537.51.2 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/7.0 Mobile/11D167 Safari/9537.53";
    var time=Math.round(new Date()/1000);
    var sign=java.md5Encode("com.ruffianhankin.meritreader1"+time+"vhjJVz1St6tK7!8n#B0MqRIuE2Dh7!C#");
    var pt = "1";
    var Content="text/html; charset=UTF-8";
    var Connection="close";
    var Accept="*/*";
    var Origin="*";
    var Headers="X-Requested-With";
    var Vary="Accept-Encoding";
    var package="com.ruffianhankin.meritreader";
    var version="3.8.6";
    var channel="baidu_tg104";
    var Cache="no-cache, no-store";
    var headers = {"Content-Type":Content,"Connection":Connection,"Accept":Accept,"Access-Control-Allow-Origin":Origin,"Access-Control-Allow-Headers":Headers,"Vary":Vary,"User-Agent":ua,"package":package,"pt":pt,"version":version,"channel":channel,"time":String(time),"sign":String(sign),"Cache-Control":Cache};
    return JSON.stringify(headers);
})()
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))

 k = 'Shuew237HSFH242s';

ruleBookInfo.author: $.author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("DeYw7vSTuV9g2qTxNZqG5mB6").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
flag=source.getVariable()=="1"?true:false

var json=java.getElement("@css:.volume-wrap h3,.volume-wrap li");
list=[];
for(i in json){
	vol=json[i].select("a").attr("class");
	if(vol.indexOf("subscri")!=-1){
		volname=json[i].text();
		list.push({
			text:"ğŸ“– [ "+String(volname).replace(/.å…±\d+ç« .*|.è®¢é˜…æœ¬å·/g,'')+" ] ğŸ“–",
			voltype:true
			})
		}else{
a=json[i].select("a")
			vip=json[i].select("em.iconfont").text()!=""?"âœ¿Â·":""
			
			text=a.text();
			href=a.attr("href");
			time=a.attr("alt");
			href=flag?href+",{'webView': true}":href
			
			list.push({
			text:String(vip+text).replace(/^(æ­£æ–‡|VIPç« èŠ‚|æœ€æ–°ç« èŠ‚)?(\s+|_)|[\(ï¼ˆã€].*[æ±‚æ›´è°¢ä¹å‘æ¨è´ºè¡¥].*/g,''),
			href:href,
			time:String(time).replace(/.*?æ—¶é—´ï¼š(.*?)ç« èŠ‚å­—æ•°ï¼š(\d+)/,'$1â€¢$2å­—'),
			voltype:false
			})
	}
	}
list
</js>
